ticket.title: i18n tests not running
ticket.original-body:
There a couple of i18n validations tests that aren't running right now, the reason? Some tests have duplicated names.
Runnning i18n validations tests: rake test_mysql TEST=cases/validations_i18n_test.rb
Output before patch: 100 tests, 107 assertions, 0 failures, 0 errors
After patch: 102 tests, 109 assertions, 0 failures, 0 errors

version.body:

[#1549 state:committed]
